Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to establishing the New York state emergency rent supplement program
Summary: Relates to establishing the New York state emergency rent supplement program; requires the commissioner of housing and community renewal to establish a program to hold security deposits and create a dispute resolution process regarding the withholding of security deposits.
LawCode: Amd ยง14, add ยง223-c, Pub Hous L; amd ยง7-103, Gen Ob L; add ยง99-ii, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, the general obligations law, and the state finance law, in relation to establishing the New York state emergency rent supplement program
